dialog.title: Confirm Removal
dialog.desc: Are you sure you want to remove this product from your cart?

shopInfo.address: Hamlet 2, Lien Phuong, Thuong Tin, Hanoi

banner.title: UNMISSABLE MOONCAKE FLAVORS
banner.desc: The national brand is the top choice for consumers

section1.desc1: Authentic mooncakes with perfect quality and standards

reason.title: Reasons
reason.desc1: We guarantee to deliver authentic Mid-Autumn mooncakes with the highest quality and standards to our customers.
reason.desc2: Valuing the meaning of the Mid-Autumn Festival, we continuously innovate and invest to introduce new product lines with the best quality and designs each year, contributing to a culturally rich Vietnamese Mid-Autumn Festival.

saleItems.title: ATTRACTIVE OFFERS
saleItems.desc: Not overly elaborate, mooncakes carry a rustic, distinctive charm that captivates generations of consumers.

about.desc01: We sincerely thank our customers for their support and trust in our products over time!
about.desc02: This Mid-Autumn Festival, Kinh Do’s most impressive innovation is the premium Golden Moon collection. Symbolizing the treasures of life—family bonds and relationships—Kinh Do introduces the Golden Moon collection with entirely new products: Golden Moon Diamond, Golden Moon Platinum, Golden Moon Gold, Golden Moon Ruby, along with new flavors using premium ingredients such as Japanese scallops with X.O sauce, King Crab, Bách Hoa Lobster, and Four Seasons Roasted Chicken.
about.desc03: We are also one of the brands voted by consumers as high-quality Vietnamese products. This success is thanks to the relentless efforts of our management, staff, and bakers in the market.
about.desc04: Above all, we wish to extend our deepest gratitude to our customers for supporting our brand throughout the years. We believe that with our efforts and your continued support, we will keep growing to serve consumers even better.
about.desc05: We aim to become the number one Mid-Autumn mooncake brand in Vietnam, committed to delivering premium, safe, and innovative products to satisfy every customer.
about.desc06: Our mission is to continuously innovate, enhance quality, and provide exceptional experiences for customers with every product, fostering family bonds and relationships.
about.desc07: We believe that success comes not only from providing quality products but also from dedication in every step of production, packaging, and customer service. Each mooncake we create is a work of art, embodying not just flavor but also love and respect for our customers.
about.desc08: In the future, we will continue to develop and upgrade our production processes, applying modern technology to deliver the best experiences to consumers. At the same time, we are committed to environmental protection, optimizing resource use, and supporting sustainable development.
about.desc09: Each product is not only a meaningful gift for the Mid-Autumn Festival but also a symbol of affection and connection that we wish to convey to every Vietnamese family. With a far-reaching vision and a steadfast mission, we aim to deliver lasting value, building trust and love from consumers.
about.desc10: Not overly elaborate, mooncakes carry a rustic, distinctive charm that captivates generations of consumers.
